message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it at $110. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
